pr_title: [#1679] Update admin guide for the MongoDB based device registry

timeline.message:
[#1679] Update admin guide for MongoDB based device registry

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#1679] Rename default device registry configuration to file based device registry configuration

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#1679] Rename default device registry configuration to file based device registry configuration

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#1679] Rename default device registry configuration to file based device registry configuration

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#1679] Update admin guide for MongoDB based device registry

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#1679] Rename default device registry configuration to file based device registry configuration

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

Fix server selection timeout default value in JavaDoc

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#1679] Changes based on feedback

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#1679] Changes based on feedback

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

[#1679] Changes based on feedback

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

Set default value of MongoDB server selection timeout to 1000 ms

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

Changes based on second round of feedback

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText: you can use the {@value } tag in order to refer to a constant's value. That way you do not need to explicitly spell it out ...
timeline.author: sophokles73
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -182,7 +183,7 @@ public MongoDbConfigProperties setConnectionString(final String connectionString * Gets the time in milliseconds that the mongo driver will wait to select a * server for an operation before raising an error. *

- * When this property is not set, the Vert.x mongodb client uses a default value of 30000 ms. + * When this property is not set, the Vert.x mongodb client uses a default value of 1000 ms.

replies.bodyText: @sophokles73 Sounds good. The corresponding changes have been made.
replies.author: kaniyan

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/services/device-registry-mongodb/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/deviceregistry/mongodb/config/MongoDbConfigProperties.java b/services/device-registry-mongodb/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/deviceregistry/mongodb/config/MongoDbConfigProperties.java index dad9de2a9..161d6f8f6 100644 --- a/services/device-registry-mongodb/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/deviceregistry/mongodb/config/MongoDbConfigProperties.java +++ b/services/device-registry-mongodb/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/deviceregistry/mongodb/config/MongoDbConfigProperties.java @@ -183,7 +183,8 @@ public final class MongoDbConfigProperties { * Gets the time in milliseconds that the mongo driver will wait to select a * server for an operation before raising an error. *

- * When this property is not set, the Vert.x mongodb client uses a default value of 1000 ms. + * When this property is not set, the Vert.x mongodb client uses a default value of + * {@value DEFAULT_SERVER_SELECTION_TIMEOUT_IN_MS} ms. * * @return The server selection timeout in milliseconds. */

timeline.message:
Fix JavaDoc using @value to specify the default server selection timeout

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>
